author: wjmelements
content: I counted again. 256 cases of EXCHANGE. 120 replace 3 SWAP bytes with 2. 136 replace 4 bytes (2 SWAP, 1 SWAPN) with 2. EXCHANGE does not replace any triple-SWAPN because the first operand always refers to an element that can be moved with current SWAP.

author: kuzdogan
content:
<@408154589494247424> I wanted to update the Rationale section to address some of the concerns. Can you please formulate what your concerns were and also explain a bit the event alternative you've proposed? 

One thing I remember is you want to avoid the costs of deploying it on the runtime bytecode. You can still do that in this scenario too by just putting the metadata in the initcode container and not in the runtime code's container. If you want to avoid it completely, you can still do that because the metadata section is optional.
